description:
Are you studying English at an elementary or pre-intermediate level?

Do you need to improve your listening and speaking skills?

Do you want to be able to use daily phrases and expressions reflexively?

Then join me in this course to practise and activate 320 basic phrases and begin to speak more fluently and confidently in many daily situations such as introducing yourself, eating out, telephoning, checking in at a hotel, going to the bank, etc.

Course content:

The course contains two hours of exclusive downloadable content (not available on my YouTube channel) comprising:

- 8 video lessons with 320 common daily phrases in 16 different situations;

- 8 audio files of dialogues for further listening practice.

You will also have:

- 8 Gap-filling exercises to test your assimilation;

- Transcripts of video lessons and audio files;

- A step-by-step study guide;

- A Discussion Forum where you can post your questions for me.

Course structure:

Before you can speak well, you have to be able to understand easily. That is why, for each phrase, we will:

1. Work on your listening comprehension (listen & write);

2. Work on your speaking and fluency (listen & repeat);

3. Test your listening comprehension (listen & understand);

4. Test your assimilation (fill in the gaps).
title: Master 320 Common English Phrases
